comments:
Hello!
My "new" bug is the dublicate of Bugzilla Bug 94010. (https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=94010)
BUT I've checked the patch - the file is correct, but error appears again and again.
Every day, after swithing on my PC, starting Eclipse 3.2 and trying to create a web-service with my correct programme, I get this error message. Usually I try to change different properties and one happy moment is starts working. But I can't recognize the action that leads to such a result - different days I did different things. I feel really sick with this problem. Please, excuse me, if I've choosen the wrong component. If it's possible, redirect it to nessesary one.
The whole report is:
IWAB0019E Error in getting method from Java bean.
IWAB0019E Error in getting method from Java bean.

Natalia,
given your reference to bug 94010, is your service class in the default package? What release of WTP are you using?

Mr. Brealey,
I'm using WTP 1.5.2. My service class is in the package created by me(as well as project).

Natalia,

Based on the stack trace, it looks like EMF is having problem getting to the Java bean.  Have you tried this in WTP 2.0 or WTP 2.0.1?  

We have not run into this problem with the drivers we tested with.  So it would really be helpful if you can provide the bean and the exact steps of how to reproduce the problem.
